section.45: The Book of Oaths (qasamah), Retaliation and Blood Money

hadiths.text: It was narrated from 'Abdullah bin Buraidah, from his father, that:a woman threw some pebbles and stuck another woman, and she miscarried. The Messenger of Allah stipulated (a Diyah of ) fifty sheep for her child. And on that day, he forbade throwing pebbles
